name: Gallian Town Citizen
description: You were raised in one of the many towns or cities of Gallia. Life had its ups and downs, but things were generally peaceful. This all changed when the empire attacked Gallia, and your life was thrown into chaos.

name: Gallian Farmer
description: You were country-bred, being raised on a farm on the outskirts of Gallia for most of your life. The war with Europa turned your entire life upside down, as entire farms and generations of work were set ablaze by invading troops.
